query:
-- Agregar stock a todos los productos
INSERT INTO inventory (userId, productId, stock, lastRestockDate)
SELECT 2, id, 10, NOW()
FROM products
WHERE userId = 2
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE stock = 10, lastRestockDate = NOW();

mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 33eHsH78PrVTUzX.935a2f0ed688 --database f6UyvHWVP2qWeDdfJX2g4J --execute 
-- Agregar stock a todos los productos
INSERT INTO inventory (userId, productId, stock, lastRestockDate)
SELECT 2, id, 10, NOW()
FROM products
WHERE userId = 2
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE stock = 10, lastRestockDate = NOW();
